original: Erkell, Harry, fil. mag., Göteborg, f. 22/7/11 i Malmö. G. 43 m. Karin Bernhard. Barn: Susanne f. 44. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 29, fil. mag. i Upps. 35, provår i Sthlm 42. Lektor i sv. språket v. Roms univ. 37-40, div. vik., ord. ämneslär. i modersm. o. tyska v. Gbgs prakt, mellansk. sed. 43.
translated: Erkell, Harry, BA, Gothenburg, b. July 22nd, 1911 in Malmö. Married in 1943 to Karin Bernhard. They have one child, Susanne, born in 1944. Harry graduated from high school in Stockholm in 1929 and received a BA from Uppsala University in 1935. He completed his teaching certification in Stockholm in 1942. Harry worked as a Swedish language lecturer at the University of Rome from 1937-1940. He has also worked as a substitute teacher and a permanent teacher in Swedish and German at the Gothenburg vocational school since 1943.
